name: @solgenomics/cxgn_js
description: node package containing all importable CXGN/SGN JavaScript files.

scripts.build: npm config set engine-strict true; rm -r build/ || true && npm install . && webpack --config build.webpack.config.js
scripts.build-watch: npm config set engine-strict true; rm -r build/ || true && npm install . && webpack --config build.webpack.config.js -w
